alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 1:31PM CST until February 17 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of a dusting up to two inches and additional ice accumulations around a light glaze. Cold temperatures and winds gusting as high as 35 mph could lead to a flash freeze potential on roads. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Kansas. Portions of central, east central, south central, and southwest Missouri. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Kansas, call 5 1 1 for road conditions. In Missouri, call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions.
